autodse.explorer.exhaustive¶

The exhaustive search algorithm

class autodse.explorer.exhaustive.ExhaustiveAlgorithm(ds: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter], batch_size: int = 8, log_file_name: str = 'algo.log')¶

Exhaustively explore the design space.

The order is based on the topological order of design parameters. Considering the evaluation overhead, we let users configure the batch size for evaluation.

batch_size¶

The batch size of producing design points.

ordered_pids¶

Design parameters in topological sort with cycle breaking.

gen() → Generator[[List[Dict[str, Union[str, int]]], Optional[Dict[str, autodse.result.Result]]], None]¶

The main generator function of search algorithm.

Returns

A generator that keeps producing design points for exploration.

traverse(point: Dict[str, Union[str, int]], idx: int) → Generator[[Dict[str, Union[str, int]], None], None]¶

DFS traverse the design space and yield leaf points.

Parameters

  • point -- The current design point.

  • idx -- The current manipulated parameter index.

Returns

A resursive generator for traversing.
